entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19.
